series_description: This series documents the advertisement schedule for construction projects. This series may include, but is not to: calendars, lists, and notices of advertisement.
retention_statement: 1 Year after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents any revisions made to requests for proposal before bid and contractors' receival of the revisions. This series may include, but is not limited to:request for proposals, revisions, and letters/correspondence.
This series documents settlements with contractors after a has been filed. This series may include, but is not limited to: preliminary engineering surveys, forms, and correspondence.

series_title: Construction Quality Improvement Program II (CQIP II) Database
series_description: This series documents quality control monitoring of projects and processes, and trends in the Construction Improvement Program (CQIP II). This series may include, but not limited to:a database.
retention_statement: 0 Years after end of calendar year

series_title: Construction Quality Improvement Program II(CQIP II): Background Materials
series_description: This series documents background materials collected by field engineers used for quality control monitoring of construction projects. This series may include, but is not limited to: field notes, photos, reports, and correspondence.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents authorization from the Federal Highway Administration (FHWA) to advertise, receive Federal aid, and coordinate the bid process and award. This series may but is not limited to: plan drawings, reports, and correspondence.
This series documents the annual qualification of contractors that is required of them in order to bid on work. This series include, but is not limited to: applications and forms.
This series documents guidelines for various types of and procedures being used for construction projects. This may include, but is not limited to:specification books.
